name: Kimchi Fried Rice
author: Diana71
summary: This is a very basic kimchi fried rice, a humble dish made with leftover rice, kimchi, and usually a processed meat like Spam®. In this recipe I used cubed ham and veggies I had in the fridge. Serve with a sunny side up egg over top if you like.
ingredients: 3 drops sesame oil, or to taste
2  scallions, white and light green parts, sliced
½ cup cubed, fully cooked ham
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Warm butter and olive oil together over medium-high heat in a large skillet or wok
Add onion, carrots, and scallions and cook until onion is translucent, about 2 minutes
Mix in cubed ham and kimchi; cook for 1 more minute
Stir in rice and cook until mixture is heated throughout
Drizzle soy sauce over top and mix in gochujang
Stir until well combined and adjust seasoning with salt and pepper
